creator: jmonnett@us.ibm.com
text:
svgGenerator does not use large arcs attribute for arcs over 180 degrees
When generating a dom tree from a JFreeChart PIE chart, any slice/arc over 180
degrees is not setting the "Large arc" attribute in the SVG file for the <path...>

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
I believe this was fixed in SVN, after the 1.6 release.
If you disagree please reopen the bug, with an example.
